ARGUMENT
s x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | decpmate.p | |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) |
| 2 |  | decpmate.c | |- C = ( N Mat P ) |
| 3 |  | decpmate.b | |- B = ( Base ` C ) |
| 4 |  | decpmatcl.a | |- A = ( N Mat R ) |
| 5 |  | decpmatfsupp.0 | |- .0. = ( 0g ` A ) |
| 6 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( 0g ` A ) e. _V |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_eqeltri | |- .0. e. _V |
| 8 | 7 | #P_a1i | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ M e. B ) -> .0. e. _V ) |
| 9 |  | #P_ovex | |- ( M decompPMat k ) e. _V |
| 10 | 9 | #P_a1i | |- ( ( ( R e. Ring /\ M e. B ) /\ k e. NN0 ) -> ( M decompPMat k ) e. _V ) |
| 11 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( k = x -> ( M decompPMat k ) = ( M decompPMat x ) ) |
| 12 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 | #P_decpmataa0 | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ M e. B ) -> E. s e. NN0 A. x e. NN0 ( s < x -> ( M decompPMat x ) = .0. ) ) |
| 13 | 8, 10, 11, 12 | #P_mptnn0fsuppd | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ M e. B ) -> ( k e. NN0 |-> ( M decompPMat k ) ) finSupp .0. ) |
